songs.lyrics:
Verse 1:

I stop and stand
In place
Frozen
Ice chills
Moving down my arms

B-Section:

Will the law of attraction
Pull me closer to you?
I can’t fathom the words to gather It’s true
I’m a mess when it comes to you
When it comes to you


Chorus:

I wanna go to
The ends of the world with you
I want to float to the sky
And be your brightest star


Verse 2:

Nostalgic vibes
When I look into those honey eyes
I’m taken back to a place of comfort
Summertime crush of mine

B-section:

Pull me closer to you
I can’t fathom the words to gather it’s true
Im a mess when it comes to you
When it comes to you

Chorus:

I wanna go to
The ends of the world with you
I want to float to the sky
And be your brightest star


Bridge:
Why can’t I form my lips to say
Baby I just want to be with you

Chorus: (2x)

I wanna go to
The ends of the world with you
I want to float to the sky
And be your brightest star
songs.title: #Crush
